Class EdidUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • oshi.util.EdidUtil

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class EdidUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    EDID parsing utility.

        public static byte[][] getDescriptors(byte[] edid)
        Get the VESA descriptors
        Parameters:
        edid - The EDID byte array
        Returns:

        Parameters:
